defaultProfiles.bio: I'm a computer science student who likes to make dishes on the side!

defaultProfiles.name: Alyssa
defaultProfiles.bio: On a quest to learn all about the gastronomy here at UH: Manoa!

defaultProfiles.name: Robert
defaultProfiles.bio: I am a student who desperately needs to budget

defaultProfiles.name: Safeway
defaultProfiles.bio: We're a part of your neighborhood, providing fresh ingredients and more ways to save.

defaultProfiles.name: Foodland
defaultProfiles.bio: Official EasyChef account for Foodland Hawaii, Hawaii's Best Grocery Store!

defaultRecipes.description: A family recipe passed down to generations that is affordable to make! I was able to get the ingredients relatively cheap at The Market near student housing. Foodland at Ala Moana is also a great alternative to search for ingredients.
steps: Boil lightly salted water then proceed to cook elbow macaroni until cooked.  Afterwards, proceed to drain.

Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat, then stir in flour and salt for 5 minutes.  Then pour in milk while stirring until it is smooth and bubbling. Next, add cheddar cheese and continue to stir until cheese is melted
Fold macaroni into cheese sauce until it is coated.
Enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: A healthy meal that is full of flavor, protein and fiber!
steps: Dice onion and mince the garlic, then cook both in a large pot with olive oil with medium heat for 1-2 minutes.  Next add ground beef and cook until it is browned.
Add flour and the chili powder to the pot and coat the meat.  Continue to stir for 1-2 minutes.
Drain and rinse the black and kidney beans.  Then add them along with the tomato sauce, and kernels to the pot.  Continue to stir after adding in the items.
Add macaroni and beef broth then proceed to stir.
Place lid on top of pot and turn the heat to high to allow pot to boil.  After boiling, stir to loosen any pasta.
Allow the pot to simmer on medium-low for 15 minutes.
Once cooked, turn heat off and stir in additional cheese until melted.
Serve and enjoy while it's still hot!

defaultRecipes.description: A very nutritious smoothie for breakfast
steps: First, add milk into the blender. The amount of how much want to drink is up to you!
Next, add spinach but make sure not to add too much.
Finally, add your frozen fruits.  If you want you can additional toppings such as other fruits!
Blend!
Transfer contents into cups and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: A delicious and healthy type of pancake!
steps: Mix together the first 6 ingredients in a bowl then set aside.  Then mix together the next 6 ingredients in a separate bowl.
Mix the two bowls into one and mix thoroughly.
Heat skillet to medium heat and pour batter.  Then cook for 2-3 min. per pancake
Enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: Everything you love about pizza stuffed into a quesadilla!
steps: Slice up vegetables then drain olives and mushrooms.
Measure 1/3 cup mozzarella per tortillas and spread over half of the tortillas.  Add additional toppings on top of the cheese
Place the pizzadilla on top of a skillet and cook until brown
Repeat steps 2 and 3 if you want to make any additional pizzadillas!

defaultRecipes.description: A classic serving of spaghetti and meatballs.
steps: In large pot, cook spaghetti then proceed to drain.
In a separate large bowl, combine the beef, parsley, parmesan, egg, and a dash of salt.  Mix then form into balls of desired size.
In another pot, put over medium heat and add oil.  Add meatballs and cook until brown.  Then transfer to a seperate plate
Add onion and tomatoes as well as salt and pepper to the pot to make the sauce and cook until it is soft.  Simmer until the sauce is thickened.
Serve spaghetti with meatballs and sauce then enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: Make shrimp with an air fryer.
ingredients: 1 lb. Large Shrimp with Tails on
steps: In a bowl, add flour and season it with salt and pepper
In another bowl, mix bread crumbs and coconut.  Store eggs in another bowl.
Dip shrimp in the flour, then dip in eggs then dip in coconut and bread crumbs mix.
Place dipped shrimps in air fryer basket and heat to 400 degrees.  Bake until golden for 10 to 12 minutes.
Create sauce by mixing mayonnaise and Sriracha.
Serve with shrimp after is has been finished in the air fryer.

defaultRecipes.description: Easy to make cookies at home!
steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
In the small bowl, add flour, baking soda, and baking powder then stir together.
In the large bowl, mix butter and sugar until it is smooth. Then add in beaten egg and vanilla.  Finally, add in and blend in contents of the small bowl.
Roll the dough of desired size an place onto cookie sheets.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes until golden.  After, let coolies stand for 2 minutes before eating.

defaultRecipes.description: Pizza always tastes great when its homemade!
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, salt, sugar, and yeast.  After mixing, add in water and oil.
Knead mixture for 2 minutes.
Transfer  mixture into greased bowl.  Then let it rise for approximately 20 minutes.
Flatten and place on pizza pan.  Proceed to further flatten into a circle.
Spread tomato sauce and cheese over crust.  Add additional toppings if desired.
Bake at 400 degrees until it is light brown.
Enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: Cookies that are better than ready-made cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees
In a large bowl, mix together butter, sugar, brown sugar until it is smooth.  Beat eggs and stir in vanilla.
Dissolve baking soda in hot water and add to bowl.
Stir in flour, salt and chocolate chip.
Transfer batter onto non-grease pan and bake in oven for approximately 10 minutes.

defaultRecipes.description: Cookies that are better than ready-made cookies.
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees
In a large bowl, mix together cream butter, cream cheese and sugar until fluffy.
Add in and mix eggs and vanilla extract.
Add in almond flour and chocolate chips and mix until dough is sticky.
Place dough in non-grease pan and bake in oven until golden brown.

defaultRecipes.description: Everyone as a college student relies on ramen, why not give it an upgrade!
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees
In a large pot, add garlic, scallions, ginger and sriracha and cook until scallions have softened.
Next stir in chicken broth into mixture.
Add in your ramen of choice (do not include the seasoning packet)
Wait until noodles soften and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: Easy to make tacos at home
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees
Cook beef in skillet with medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes while stirring.
Add in and stir salsa onto the beef and heat to boiling.  Mix and cook for 5 minutes and pour beef mixture into separate bowl.
Heat taco shells and serve each shell with a serving a of the beef mixture, lettuce, tomato and cheddar cheese.

defaultRecipes.description: Add a custom spin to popcorn!
steps: Pour desired amount of kernels onto bowl.
Add in desired amount of butter and cheese.
Be sure to add in any additional toppings if desired!
Cover bowl with microwave safe lid and place in microwave until all kernels have been popped.

defaultRecipes.description: Add a custom spin to popcorn!
steps: In a bowl, add in dried seaweed, sesame seeds, chile seasoning and salt and pulse until it becomes powder
Pour desired amount of kernels onto bowl.
Add in desired amount of liquid butter
Cover bowl with microwave safe lid and put in microwave.
Heat bowl in microwave until all kernels have been popped.
Enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: Make morning scrambled eggs the easy way.
steps: In a bowl, shred cheese (ignore step if cheese is already shredded
Place skillet on stove over medium low heat
In a separate bowl, break eggs and toss away shell.  Add in water or milk.
With a fork, beat eggs for 30 seconds or longer until eggs are mixed well.
Grease skillet and pour mixed eggs onto the skillet.
Using a spoon, move the mix toward the center as it attempts to spread out on the skillet.
Once the the mix no longer spreads out, turn and cook any undercooked areas.
Turn off stove once all sides have been cooked and serve.

defaultRecipes.description: All you need is a toaster oven to start your day with bacon.
steps: Pre-heat toaster oven to 400 degrees
Cover tray with foil and lay out desired amount of baking strips.
Set toaster oven to bake.  Then bake for approximately 7-9 minutes.
When back curls up, flip over bacon to cook any undercooked sides.
Transfer bacon onto plate and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: Easy to make pita chips with just a toaster oven
steps: Pre-heat toaster oven to 375 degrees and set to bake.
Spread oil and choice of seasoning onto the pitas.
Slice pitas into triangles and place them on toaster oven tray with baking sheet
Place pits into toaster oven abd bake until lightly brown.
Serve with additional sides and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: Make quesadilla with just a microwave.
steps: Microwave tortillas until crispy.
In a bowl, mix chicken, pepper and seasoning until combine.  Then cook in microwave for 1 minute.
Spread the bowl mixture evenly on the tortillas.
Cook tortillas once again for approximately 30 seconds or more.
Remove from microwave and serve!

defaultRecipes.description: With just a microwave, you can easily make fried rice!
steps: In the bowl, add in and stir rice, water, soy sauce, and oil.
Cover bowl with microwave safe lid and microwave for approximately 6 minutes.
Add in frozen peas after bowl has been microwaved.
In a separate bowl, beat eggs.  Then, add in beaten eggs into bowl.
With the eggs, microwave bowl for a minute until eggs are cooked.
Serve with additional toppings and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: With just a microwave, you can easily make fried rice!
steps: Cook pasta in a pot and let it sit on medium heat.
In the skillet, add in chicken broth, and chicken then cook until the meat is cooked.
In the sauce pan, add butter and garlic until melted.  Afterwards proceed to whisk in flour and add milk.
Add cheese and cooked chicken to the pot and reduce heat to low until sauce thickens.  Add the sauce to the cooked.
Season with salt and pepper and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: You just need a microwave to make a delicious pizza
steps: Place desired amount of muffins/pizzas on a plate.
Spread tomato sauce on half of each muffin.
Sprinkle in mozzarella cheese and additional cheese if desired.
Add in additional toppings like pepperoni.
Microwave pizzas for 2 minutes or until cheese is fully melted.
Enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: Delicious brownies with only a toaster oven.
steps: In a sauce pan, cook butter and cocoa powder until powder is aromatic.
Add in sugar and whisked egg as well as the vanilla extract.
Mix in flour until batter is completely mixed.
Transfer batter into pan that fits into toaster oven.
Set toaster oven to toast for approximately 15 minutes.
Remove pan from toaster oven then let brownies cool.

defaultRecipes.description: No longer will you have to resort to cup of noodles.
steps: In a sauce pan, place eggs and add cold water. Then proceed to boil for 1 minute.  Remove from heat and set aside from 8-10 minutes.  Then peel and half the eggs.
In a stock pot, heat olive oil and add garlic then proceed to stir for approximately 2 minutes
Add in 3 additional cups of water and the chicken broth.  Then whisk.
Bring pot to a boil for 10 minutes.  Then add in and stir the Yaki-Soba noodles until it is loosened.
Stir in spinach for an additional 2 minutes
Serve and garnish with eggs from step 1.

defaultRecipes.description: Make delicious caramel popcorn that is better than traditional popcorn!
steps: In a sauce pan, add butter and let it melt over medium heat.
Add in sugar and stir until thoroughly mixed
Continue to stir then add in the vanilla.  Continue to mixing.
Add in baking soda and mix until mixture changes colors.
Microwave desired amount of popcorn.
Drizzle mixture onto popcorn and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: Make delicious caramel popcorn that is better than traditional popcorn!
steps: In the toaster oven, bake biscuit dough according to package instructions.
In the skillet, cook sausages over medium heat for 3-5 minutes.  Then mash into small pieces and drain.
Add butter and heat until melted.
Stir in flour, salt, milk and pepper.
Bring skillet to a boil and stir until it is thickened.
Serve gravy with biscuits when it is completed in the toaster oven.

defaultRecipes.description: Start your day with delicious waffles.
steps: In the large bowl, mix in eggs, milk and butter until mixture is softened.
In another large bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, sugar and salt.
Combine contents of both bowls into one.
Prepare waffle iron by spraying it with baking spray.
Pour in batter and cook until waffle is golden brown.
Remove waffle and continue to make more or store batter for later use.

defaultRecipes.description: Blueberry waffles has never tasted so good.
steps: In the small bowl, mix in eggs, milk and butter until mixed.
In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, sugar and salt.
Pour contents of step 1 into the large bowl.
Add in and pour blueberries
Pour in batter and cook until waffle is crispy.
Serve with butter and syrup and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: Blueberry Pancakes. Yummy.
steps: In the small bowl, mix in eggs, milk.
In a large bowl, sift flour, salt, baking powder, and sugar.
Pour contents of step 1 into the large bowl.
Add in and pour blueberries.  Set aside for 1 our
Pour in batter onto frying pan until bottom is brown.  Flip and brown other side
Repeat previous step for additional pancakes.
Serve with additional toppings and enjoy.

defaultRecipes.description: Simple strawberry banana smoothie.
steps: Simply put in all ingredients in blender jar.
Cover lid and blend until mixture is smooth.
Transfer content onto a cup and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: A delicious berry smoothie.
steps: Simply put in all ingredients in blender jar.
Cover lid and blend until mixture is smooth.
Transfer content onto a cup and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: A yummy peanut butter smoothie.
steps: Simply put in all ingredients in blender jar.
Cover lid and blend until mixture is smooth.
Transfer content onto a cup and enjoy!

defaultRecipes.description: A green smoothie to help start your day.
steps: Simply put in all ingredients in blender jar.
Cover lid and blend until mixture is smooth.
Transfer content onto a cup and top with green leaves.
Enjoy!
